content.question: A country’s government runs a budget deficit when which of the following occurs in a given year?

choices.label: The amount of new loans to developing nations exceeds the amount of loans paid off by developing nations.
The debt owed to foreigners exceeds the debt owed to the country’s citizens.
The amount borrowed exceeds the interest payment on the national debt.
Interest payments on the national debt exceed spending on goods and services.

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
